m_szDocSumamry: Latest:Archive:2011:July-September "Latest Features" Archive: July - September, 2011 Click here for most recent "latest" listings. 2011 Latest:Archive:2011:October-December - going forward in times September Featured / Best Exotic FE : Electrostatic > Aviso > Typhoon Floods Free Energy Inventor's Workshop - Ismael Aviso, an alternative energy pioneer from the Philippines, has experienced a weather-related disaster. A recent tropical system has flooded his home and workshop, and has set back his research and development work by a few weeks. (PESN and BeforeItsNews ; September 30, 2011) Featured
